summary: A nervous woman-shy office clerk, already troubled by an amorous female co-worker, suddenly has to deal with a very forward and attractive young woman who has sneaked into his apartment - and doesn't want to leave.
cast: Edward Everett Horton|Patsy Ruth Miller|Louise Fazenda|Vera Lewis|T. Roy Barnes|E.J. Ratcliffe|Louise Beavers|Edna Murphy|Frank Beal|Vince Barnett|Lloyd Ingraham|Robert Gordon|Fred Kelsey|Robert Dudley|Louise Lester
title: Wide Open
